aka: เพลิงกฤษณา 系列

cast.name: 卡侬尼·加萨米特诺 Kaneungnij Jaksamittanon
阿卡纳吾·曼格拉苏 Akalavut Mankalasut
娜帕特·邦查昂奇派赛 Napat Banchongchitpaisal

trans_title: เพลิงกฤษณา 系列
introduction: Everyone yearns for a good life. So does Nueng. She always dreams of living in her ideal world. Nueng, who is as beautiful as a swan, comes from a wealthy family. She's married and her husband loves her very much. However, things are not as perfect as it seems. Nueng is not satisfied with her current life. With her beauty and social status, she socializes with other men. Will Nueng finally live the life she wants?
